me.lihq.game.people

Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • me.lihq.game.people.AbstractPerson
          • me.lihq.game.people.NPC

  • public class NPC
extends AbstractPerson
    The class which is responsible for the non-playable characters within the game that the player will meet.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class me.lihq.game.people.AbstractPerson

    • Field Detail

      • alreadyAskedClues

        public java.util.List<Clue> alreadyAskedClues
        List of clues NPC has already been asked about. Used to ensure the player only gets points for asking an NPC about a clue once.

      • ignored

        public boolean ignored
        Used to track whether the NPC has been ignored, and thus won't respond to the player until another clue has been found.

      • accused

        public boolean accused
        Used to track whether the NPC has been accused, so they can ignore the player after a false accusation.

      • jsonFilePath

        protected java.lang.String jsonFilePath
        This stores the path for the JSON file

        protected java.lang.String spritesheetFile
        This stores the spritesheet file path

      • NPC

        public NPC(GameMain game,
           java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String spriteSheet,
           int tileX,
           int tileY,
           Room room,
           java.lang.String jsonFile)
        Define an NPC with location coordinates, room, spritesheet and name
        Parameters:
        tileX - x coordinate of tile that the NPC will be initially rendered on.
        tileY - y coordinate of tile that the NPC will be initially rendered on.
        room - ID of room they are in
        spriteSheet - Spritesheet for this NPC

        Parameters:
        other - - The NPC to copy
        map - - The map the new NPC should be in

      • setKiller

        public boolean setKiller()
        Sets the NPC as the killer for this game.

        It first checks they aren't the victim.

        Returns:
        Whether it successfully set the NPC to the killer or not

      • setVictim

        public boolean setVictim()
        Sets the NPC as the victim for this game.

        It first checks the NPC isn't the killer.

        Returns:
        Whether it successfully set the NPC to the victim or not

      • getSpeech

        public java.lang.String getSpeech(Clue clue,
                                  AbstractPerson.Personality style,
                                  AbstractPerson.Personality player)
        Handles speech for a question about a clue. If the style of question matches both the player's personality and the NPC's personality, generates an improved response. If it matches just one of the player's or NPC's personalities, generates a normal response. If it matches neither, generates a non-response.
        Parameters:
        clue - The clue to be questioned about
        style - The style of questioning
        player - The personality type of the player
        Returns:
        The appropriate line of dialogue.

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
